adviseScripts.text: Ugh, class is so boring!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I don't know how other people endure it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Maybe they just grin and bear it, even though it's deathly boring.
Maybe they actually enjoy being in class.
I think you may be right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Even if they don't say as much, I'm sure they must feel that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I look around during class, I always see a few people dozing off,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: and many more doing all sorts of other things.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Argh, I really feel like I'm gonna die of boredom over here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: *Gasp*! No way!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: There's no way people like that actually exist.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Oh!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Unless we're talking about a model student like Zwei.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein explains how not to get caught slacking off during class.
Teacher, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Give me your phone for a second.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Sorry, no can do.
Sure, here you go.
Aw, why not?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Not even for a moment?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Come on! Please?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I swear it'll only be for a moment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm curious about what kind of music you listen to.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Woohoo!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Thanks, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I can see you're curious why I asked for your phone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm curious as to what songs you've got on your playlist.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You don't have just old songs on there, do you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I have a conversation about our favorite music.
Teacher, come here for a moment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Now, smile.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Smile broadly.
Don't smile and look serious.
Wow, amazing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You're really handsome, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I thought the others were exaggerating a bit when they said how handsome you were,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: but you're really dashing when you smile.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: What's with that face? I said smile.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Then again,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: you actually look pretty good with a serious expression.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You look like a professional model.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein continues to compliment my appearance throughout the counseling session.
Mhmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Oh yeah!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: What's this song? You seem to really like it.
Mhmm... oh yeah!
*Gasp* You don't know this song?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: This song is at the top of the charts right now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's been in a boatload of ads and videos.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm disappointed in you, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I knew you'd be familiar with this song.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Isn't the chorus out of this world?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's so catchy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I often find myself humming it without even realizing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I spend time listening to the song.
Ugh, I can't stand homework.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's got to be the most irritating thing in the world.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Can you help me out, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Okay, I'll help.
Doesn't that defeat the purpose of homework?
Yes, score!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: This is the part I'm stuck on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: ... This is the first page.
Yeah, and?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I didn't start yet, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Oh my gosh... déjà vu.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: That's exactly what Miss Marciana told me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Honestly, whether I do it on my own or with someone helping me, it's the exact same thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: So help me out, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I help Ein with her homework.
Teacher, look at this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's a photo I took of Rei dozing off in class earlier.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Isn't she adorable?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I just wanna eat her up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: What a strange thing to say...
I know what you mean. She's so cute.
It's just an expression!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's not like I'm actually gonna start munching on her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: ... Oh, actually...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Come to think of it, I think I did bite her before.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Fine, I'll be more careful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I know, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Especially her cheeks!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Whenever she wakes up from a nap, her cheeks are always beet red from resting on her desk.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's absolutely adorable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Nothing beats poking her squishy cheeks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh* I wish I could poke them now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I have a conversation about Rei.
I love Zwei,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: but she can be really frustrating sometimes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Does it have to do with her being a model student?
Oh? What do you mean?
Exactly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: She nags me relentlessly if I so much as break the most trivial rule.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: She acts like it's the end of the world if her grades drop the tiniest bit.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes I feel that she's too tightly wound.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I thought you'd know what I was talking about, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: To me, it feels like Zwei is a prisoner to expectations.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: She has to always be the model student of all model students.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: That causes her to behave in ways which can be frustrating sometimes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I have a conversation about Zwei.
Wow, look at this, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I got my nails done. What do you think? I did it myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Too many jewels for my liking.
Very flashy. I like it.
You think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: That style has been in vogue lately,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: but I guess it's not your cup of tea.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I know, right? So sparkly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I was asking you because I wasn't sure if I was going over the top with it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad that you like it too.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It was worth the effort, hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I listen to Ein brag about her nails for a while.
H-hello, Rupee.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Do you remember me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: No, that sounds way too timid.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Dang it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein is holding her phone, agonizing over a text.
Looking over her shoulder, I can see she's writing a message to Rupee.
Give her advice on what to send.
Say nothing.
Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You came just in time!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I can't send this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm too nervous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Can you help me compose a message instead?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Just don't come off too clingy or too formal!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: How have you been? I hope you're doing well.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: No, that's too generic.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Oh, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Why are you just standing there?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Hurry up and sit over here. I've got something important I need your help with.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein agonizes over her text for a long time, but eventually decides not to contact Rupee.
Teacher, are you busy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Yeah, I'm busy.
No, I'm not busy.
Aw, that's too bad.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I was planning on going somewhere fun.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: But if you're busy, I guess that plan is out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Let's hurry and continue with our session.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Why don't we go shopping together, then?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'll pick out a nice outfit for you!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Let's hurry and finish our session!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I quickly finish my session with Ein.
I wanna go to a karaoke bar!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: What do you usually do when you go to a karaoke bar, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: The reason I ask is because you don't seem like the type to stand up and belt your heart out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I love singing, so I never put the mic down.
I help set the mood by shaking a tambourine.
Wow, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I never expected that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You say you never put the microphone down?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Sounds like I may have some competition!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: That's perfect.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I really like people who play the tambourine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It feels a bit empty when it's just me singing alone.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I hear the tambourine, my heart starts to race!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Let's go to karaoke together next time, Teacher!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I have a conversation about karaoke.
What are we going to talk about today, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: What about school?
What about dreams?
School? What's there to talk about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Class is boring.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Homework is irritating.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It can be fun at times because of my friends and classmates.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: What else is there?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: That's great!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You must be tired of hearing me say this by now,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: but my dream is to become an exclusive designer for Rushae.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm going to make it a reality, no matter what I do!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I even started studying design!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I spend some time talking about various things.
Teacher, I have big news!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Miss Marciana didn't check our homework today!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: She's usually so strict, so for her to not check our homework... I thought I was dreaming!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Maybe the homework wasn't due today.
You're right. You are dreaming right now.
Oh, really? No way...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: *Gasp* Oh my gosh!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: The homework is due tomorrow.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: How did you know, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You're amazing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Hey!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm not a kid, you know?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Do you really think I'd fall for a childish joke like that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I help Ein finish her homework.
Rupee is my favorite person.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: What about you, Teacher?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's a secret.
You.
Everything is a secret with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You're not too embarrassed to reveal your favorite, are you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Fine, let me guess.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Zwei? Rei? Or Rupee as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Huh? Me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You're lying, aren't you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Wait... you're not?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Wh-what about me is...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: How can you be so brazen?! This is embarrassing!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Man, is it me, or it's getting hot in here?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I have a conversation about our favorite people.
Phew... I'm drained.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Maybe it's because I've been really hitting the books in class lately.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: How about we take a rest today?
Why don't we go outside and hang out?
That sounds great.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Can I lie down on the sofa?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: No way, I'm pooped.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I don't have the energy to go gallivanting about now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein lies on the sofa.
Isn't the weather lovely outside?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's a perfect day for skipping school and hanging out outside.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Be that as it may, you should still go to school.
Why don't we hang out after school?
I know, I know. I will.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I wasn't really planning on playing hooky.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: *Gasp* Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Yay! Where should we go?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: But skipping school is a big no-no, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I really shouldn't joke about these things.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein eventually makes it to school on time.
Hey Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Don't you think Naga and Tia are a bit unusual?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: You mean because they always stick together?
You mean because they're so obsessed with desserts and accessories?
Yes, exactly!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I don't think
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I've ever seen them be apart.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: They must have been close in their past life.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: How's that strange?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Everyone's into different things. That's totally fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I have a conversation about Naga and Tia.
Teacher, let's make a bet!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Who can type a message faster and more accurately without looking at the screen?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: No, I don't want to.
Okay, let's do it.
Why not?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm confident that I'll win!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Let's try it just once, pleaaaaase?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Alright!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Then, get ready!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Go!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: *Tadadadadadak* *Ding*
Yes! I won!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein gives me tips on how to type quickly on the phone.
I bumped into Tia at the dessert shop earlier.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: She was buying more than 20 slices of cake.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: How can she pack away that many sweets?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: She has a separate stomach for desserts.
You should ask her yourself.
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Now that I think about it,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I'm pretty sure she said something along those lines.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Fascinating!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I did!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: ... But I forget what her answer was.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I have a conversation about what desserts we like.
Here, take this, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: It's a snack Rei gave me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I left some for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Thanks.
No thanks, I'm fine. I'm full.
No need to thank me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: The snacks Rei gives out are always super delicious,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: so I wanted you to try some.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Here, then take this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: This one is smaller than the others.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Just take one.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: I brought them specially for you, Teacher.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ein

adviseScripts.text: Ein and I indulge in some snacks.
